detectors.description:
Token (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#3-39) has the function that can only return the default value
	Default value functions:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#6)
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#10)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#16)
	- Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#23)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#29)
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#34)

detectors.description:
StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#43-51) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] >= _value && balances[_to] + _value >= balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#45)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#46)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#47)
detectors.markdown:
[StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#L43-L51) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[msg.sender] >= _value && balances[_to] + _value >= balances[_to]](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#L45)
	- [balances[msg.sender] -= _value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#L46)
	- [balances[_to] += _value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#L47)

detectors.description:
StandardToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#53-61) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[_from] >= _value && allowed[_from][msg.sender] >= _value && balances[_to] + _value >= balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#54)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#55)
	- balances[_from] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#56)
	- allowed[_from][msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#57)

detectors.description:
ExtendToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#97-111) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[_from] >= _value && allowance >= _value && balances[_to] + _value >= balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#100)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#101)
	- balances[_from] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#102)

detectors.description:
ExtendToken.mint(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#116-122) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- totalSupply = totalSupply + _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#117)
	- balances[owner] = balances[owner] + _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AGCToken.sol#118)
